name: GoGodotJam3: Ruler of Rando
description:
Take on the aspect of a demon and evolve your way to victory! Eat fruit to change shapes and learn how to beat the puzzles and collect keys so you can escape the maze of Rando! 

WASD or arrows for controls, space bar launches an attack if your evolution has one.

Warning: game is unfinished! But it works decently and is pretty fun!
